overview: John N. Hendrick brings NeoVista nearly three decades of executive experience in the medical device industry. He has direct experience in building and growing both small medical technology companies and large corporations, with a particular expertise on research, development, manufacturing, and business operations. He has experience taking a small start-up company through the IPO process, and started a medical division of Sanmina-Sci which he grew into an over $600 million division, capturing the number one worldwide market position.
